title: BIB Homepage
cleaned_text: Be In Balance Wellness Centre is a group of professionals dedicated to helping you achieve your wellness objectives. Through a combination of natural health care, councelling, naturopathy, homeopathy and natural herbal medicines we aim to give you and your family maximum benefits for a healthy life now and for the future. Be In Balance's treatment plans are professionally prescribed using nutrition or food as medicine, herbal medicine preparations, vitamins and minerals, Australian Bush Flower essences, Homoeopathic medicines, and lifestyle recommendations according to the individual. By combining additional treatments like acupuncture, massage and oriental medicine Be in Balance provides a holistic family health clinic.
